Description: Limestone stela; Greek text; representation of a dove beneath a cross.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.141)
Budge 1909 / Guide to the Egyptian collections (Sculpture). (284)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Gr. I App:10 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
